articles.title: Singaporean asks if there’s a loneliness epidemic going on
articles.summary:
📰 싱가포르 관련 뉴스
📢 Singaporean asks if there’s a loneliness epidemic going on
articles.content: SINGAPORE: “Do you feel lonely in Singapore too?” a local Reddit user asked in a post on Monday morning (Jul 21). They wrote about feeling “surrounded yet unseen” despite living in a crowded city, calling loneliness a “quiet epidemic” that is no longer found only among those who are alone but also strikes even those […]

articles.content: SINGAPORE: A recent comic strip about the limits of filial piety from The Woke Salaryman has garnered significant attention online, not just from Singaporeans but also from other Asians. This should come as no surprise, given that respect and reverence for elders is one of the key values in this part of the world. Captioned […]
